meanings.sent2: During flu season, expectoration is common as people try to get rid of mucus.
meanings.sent3: The expectoration contest at the fair was surprisingly popular.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like expectoration, clearing the air of any misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The sound of expectoration echoed through the quiet room, signaling recovery.
